#summary Calculator.NET
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

*Calculator.NET* is an easy to use calculator with unique features for Microsoft Windows operating system. Calculator.NET can be used to perform any of the standard operations for which you would normally use a calculator. Calculator.NET is written in C# Programming Language and it requires [http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=333325FD-AE52-4E35-B531-508D977D32A6&displaylang=en .NET_Framework_3.5].

*Current Version: Calculator.NET-1.1.0.1 (beta) [http://calculator.googlecode.com/files/Calculator.NET-1.1.0.1-Setup.exe download]*
